emr_vis_nlp.model

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.model.Document
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentMedColon

    public abstract class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single unit of data (ie, records for 1 patient, single arguing document, etc.). Will generally be decomposed to finer granularity (ie, multiple EMRs, multiple paragraphs, etc.)
